{{Infobox sports rivalry | name = Tirana derby I | other names = | image = | caption = The derby between [[KF Tirana|Tirana]] and [[Partizani Tirana|Partizani]]. | city or region = [[Tirana]],
{{flag|Albania}} | first contested = | teams involved = [[KF Tirana]], [[Partizani Tirana]] | most wins = [[Partizani Tirana]] (53) | most player appearances = | mostrecent = [[SK Tirana]] 2-2 [[Partizani Tirana]] | nextmeeting = | total = 133 matches | league = [[Kategoria superiore]] | regularseason = | postseason = | largestvictory = [[Partizani Tirana]] 3-8 [[KF Tirana]] }} The '''Tirana derby I''' is the name given to any [[association football|football]] match contested between [[KF Tirana]] and [[Partizani Tirana]] football clubs, the two biggest rivals in [[Tirana]] in [[Albania]].[http://www.fotbal.tv/matches/2008/12/07/albania/super-league/kf-partizani-tirana/kf-tirana/685563/head2head/ Derbys between 1997-present] ==Win-loss totals== {|class=wikitable style="text-align:center" !Competition !Played !KF Tirana !Draw !Partizani !KF Tirana
